SEARCH
Package supermarket.domain.controllers

Class ProductController

java.lang.Object
supermarket.domain.controllers.ProductController
public class ProductController extends Object
ProductController class is responsible for managing products. It can define, delete, modify and get information about products.

    • getNProducts

      public int getNProducts()
      Returns number of products defined.
      Returns:
      Number of products defined.

    • existsProduct

      public boolean existsProduct(int barcode)
      Checks if product exists.
      Parameters:
      barcode - Barcode of the product to be checked.
      Returns:
      Returns true if product exists, false if it doesn't.

    • getProductInfo

      public ProductInfo getProductInfo(int barcode)
      Gets product info from its barcode, and throws an error if it doesn't exist.
      Parameters:
      barcode - The barcode of the desired product.
      Returns:
      Returns the product info with the given barcode.

    • defineProduct

      public void defineProduct(int barcode, String name, float price, String shelfType)
      Defines and creates new product, so it can be used.
      Parameters:
      barcode - Identifier of the product.
      name - Name of the product.
      price - Price of the product.
      shelfType - Shelf type which this product belongs to.

    • deleteProduct

      public void deleteProduct(int barcode)
      Deletes the product and discards it from all stores.
      Parameters:
      barcode - Identifier of the product to be deleted.

    • getDefinedBarcodes

      public Set<Integer> getDefinedBarcodes()
      Returns a sorted set with all defined barcodes (barcodes of all defined products).
      Returns:
      Ordered set of all defined barcodes.

    • modifyPriceProduct

      public void modifyPriceProduct(int barcode, float price)
      Modifies the price of the specified product
      Parameters:
      barcode - Identifier of the product to be shown.
      price - Price to be set for the product.

    • modifyShelfTypeProduct

      public void modifyShelfTypeProduct(int barcode, String shelfType)
      Modifies the price of the specified product
      Parameters:
      barcode - Identifier of the product to be shown.
      shelfType - ShelfType to be set for the product.

    • getShelfType

      public String getShelfType(int barcode)
      Returns the ShelfType of the specified product.
      Parameters:
      barcode - Identifier of the product to be shown.
      Returns:
      Returns ShelfType of the product with barcode.

    • getName

      public String getName(int barcode)
      Returns the name of the specified product.
      Parameters:
      barcode - Identifier of the product to be shown.
      Returns:
      Returns the name of the product with the specified barcode.

      public float getPrice(int barcode)
